Package com.atakmap.filesystem

Class HashingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.filesystem.HashingUtils
  • public class HashingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Support for MD5 and SHA2-256 hashing

    • Method Detail

      • md5sum

        public static java.lang.String md5sum​(java.io.File file)
        This constructs an md5sum from the contents of the file provided. Due to a bug in the original implementation, the leading zero would be dropped from the computed md5sum.

      • md5sum

        public static java.lang.String md5sum​(java.lang.String content)
        This constructs an md5sum from the contents of the string provided. Due to a bug in the * original implementation, the leading zero would be dropped from the computed md5sum.

      • verify

        public static boolean verify​(java.io.File file,
                             long sizeToMatch,
                             java.lang.String sha256ToMatch)
        Verify that file has the specified size and hash
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        sizeToMatch - the size of the file
